user: I haven't received my hall ticket yet. What should I do?
assistant: Please check the student portal (https://sp.srmist.edu.in/srmiststudentportal/students/loginManager/youLogin.jsp) under the "Examinations" tab. If it's still unavailable, contact the exam coordinator immediately.

user: My name is misspelled on the hall ticket.
assistant: Kindly report this to the administration office with a valid ID proof. They will issue a corrected version.

user: The exam timetable is clashing with my other elective.
assistant: Thank you for notifying us. Please submit a formal clash request form through the exam cell.

user: I have a medical emergency on the day of my exam. Can I get a reschedule?
assistant: In such cases, submit a medical certificate and an application to the controller of examinations. Each case is reviewed individually.

user: There is no information about the venue of my exam.
assistant: Exam venues are usually updated 48 hours prior. Please recheck your portal or bulletin board.

user: I’m unable to log into the exam portal for my online test.
assistant: Try resetting your password or switching browsers. If the issue persists, contact the IT cell immediately.

user: The questions in today's exam were completely out of syllabus.
assistant: We understand your concern. Kindly submit a grievance form detailing the questions, and the exam committee will review it.

user: My registration number is showing as invalid when I attempt to log in.
assistant: Ensure that your registration number is entered correctly. If the issue continues, contact the exam helpdesk.

user: I reached 10 minutes late and was not allowed to enter.
assistant: As per policy, late entry is not permitted beyond 5 minutes. Please ensure timely arrival for future exams.

user: I couldn’t upload my answer script on time due to internet issues.
assistant: Attach a screenshot of the error and email your script within 30 minutes. This will be treated as a special case.

user: Will there be a revaluation for today's exam?
assistant: Revaluation forms will be available after the results are published. You can apply within 7 working days.

user: My internal marks are not updated correctly.
assistant: Please contact your course faculty with proof of evaluation. They will communicate with the exam cell if correction is needed.

user: The exam invigilator was behaving rudely.
assistant: We apologize for the experience. Kindly submit a written complaint so that the matter can be investigated properly.

user: Will rough sheets be provided in the exam hall?
assistant: Yes, you will be given sufficient rough sheets. No additional personal sheets are allowed.

user: My calculator was not allowed inside the exam hall.
assistant: Only non-programmable calculators are permitted. Please ensure you bring the correct type next time.

user: The OMR sheet I received was damaged.
assistant: Please inform the invigilator immediately in such cases so a replacement can be provided.

user: When will the backlog exam schedule be released?
assistant: The backlog schedule will be uploaded on the official portal within two weeks after the current semester exams.

user: I was marked absent even though I attended the exam.
assistant: Please report this to the exam cell with your attendance slip or invigilator’s signature as proof.

user: I need a copy of my answer sheet for review.
assistant: You can request a copy through the answer script viewing process. Details will be posted post-result declaration.

user: Can I write the exam from home due to health issues?
assistant: Currently, all exams are held offline unless otherwise notified by the university. Please refer to official circulars for exceptions.

user: Where do I see my exam timetable?
assistant: Login to your student portal (https://sp.srmist.edu.in/srmiststudentportal/students/loginManager/youLogin.jsp) and click “Scribe Request” on the left. Choose the month and year of your exams. There you can see the dates of your examinations.

user: How do I get my exam hall ticket?
assistant: Login to your student portal (https://sp.srmist.edu.in/srmiststudentportal/students/loginManager/youLogin.jsp) and click “Exam Hall Ticket” on the left. If you see no exam hall ticket, wait for a faculty to respond or wait a couple of days.

user: Where do I pay my exam fees?
assistant: Login to your student portal (https://sp.srmist.edu.in/srmiststudentportal/students/loginManager/youLogin.jsp) and click “Fee Payment” and click “Fee Details”. There you can see how much exam fees or fees in general you have to pay.

user: Where do I see my exam results?
assistant: Login to your student portal (https://sp.srmist.edu.in/srmiststudentportal/students/loginManager/youLogin.jsp) and click “Exam Provisional Results” on the left.

user: Do I need to deposit my bag in a dedicated place? If so, where?
assistant: Yes, bags need to be deposited before going to the exam hall. The locations for bag deposit will be revealed along with the seating plan.
